thread.title: Video review: A closer look at the Moto X Style
thread.title_full: Video review: A closer look at the Moto X Style

title: Video review: A closer look at the Moto X Style
text:
Oct 09, 2015, 10.10 PM | Source: CNBC-TV18 Video review: A closer look at the Moto X Style This device definitely makes a good first impression its sturdy body, feels good to hold and the performance is snappy. But if you compare its price range there are other cheaper and better options you may want to consider.   Video review: A closer look at the Moto X Style This device definitely makes a good first impression its sturdy body, feels good to hold and the performance is snappy. But if you compare its price range there are other cheaper and better options you may want to consider.   
M otorola recently launched the newest generation of its premium smartphone Moto X. The 16GB variant of the Moto-X Style is priced at Rs 29,999 and the 32GB version at RS 31,999. Here's a video review.
